sentences: Viime hetkellä hän päätti tulla mukaan.
context: The word 'hetki' in Finnish refers to a short period of time, like a moment or minute. It can also mean an instant or a specific point in time. The word declines based on case, as shown in the dictionary definitions, and can be used with possessive suffixes to indicate whose moment it is (e.g., 'hetkeni' - my moment).
